name: cshwfn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wfn(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))

comment: A cyclically shifted word is a function with a half-open range of integers of the same length as the word as domain. (Contributed by AV, 12-Nov-2018.)
